Class SceneManager

java.lang.Object
application.view.SceneManager
public class SceneManager extends Object
Manages view switching within a single Scene. Uses a StackPane as root so overlays (such as the pause menu) can stack on top.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SceneManager(javafx.stage.Stage stage, int width, int height)
    Creates a new scene manager and attaches a scene to the given stage.

    • SceneManager

      public SceneManager(javafx.stage.Stage stage, int width, int height)
      Creates a new scene manager and attaches a scene to the given stage.
      Parameters:
      stage - the primary stage
      width - the scene width in pixels
      height - the scene height in pixels
